author: Hannah
title: *HOT* Target Cartwheel: NEW 20% Off Clearance Shoes For The Family = Shoes Starting At $4.78

organizations.name: toddler girls’ sue mary jane shoes cat & jack
ecom circo clogs kailey purple purple

text:
Through January 28th, head on over to the Target Cartwheel Site where you can load this *HOT* offer for 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family . To see if these items are in-stock at your local store and what the price is, just copy the DPCI numbers below and then go here to search.

Girls’ Lindsay BFF Zip Up High Top Sneakers Cat & Jack $5.98 
Use the 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family Cartwheel Offer -will deduct $1.20 
Final cost $4.78!
– DCPI 093-09-2379 (go here to search)

Ecom Circo Clogs Kailey Purple Purple 4-5 $7.48 
Use the 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family Cartwheel Offer -will deduct $1.50 
Final cost $5.98!
– DCPI 093-10-1697 (go here to search)

Women’s Lunea Canvas Sneakers $8.48 
Use the 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family Cartwheel Offer -will deduct $1.70 
Final cost $6.78!
– DCPI 096-12-2897 (go here to search)

Girls’ Stevies #YUMMM High Top Sneakers $8.38 
Use the 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family Cartwheel Offer -will deduct $1.68 
Final cost $6.70!
– DCPI 093-09-2749 (go here to search)

Imn Shoes Child Sneakers Spdrman Red Sneaker Marvel Spiderman $11.48 
Use the 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family Cartwheel Offer -will deduct $2.30 
Final cost $9.18!
– DCPI 093-02-3448 (go here to search)

Toddler Girls’ Sue Mary Jane Shoes Cat & Jack $7.48 
Use the 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family Cartwheel Offer -will deduct $1.50 
Final cost $5.98!
– DCPI 093-01-7266 (go here to search)

Women’s Legend 2 Performance Sneakers Blue 6 – C9 Champion $10.48 
Use the 20% off Clearance Shoes For The Family Cartwheel Offer -will deduct $2.10 
Final cost $8.38!
– DCPI 098-07-1826 (go here to search)

This offer is also available on clearance shoes online when you enter promo code SHOES20 at checkout. You may be able to opt for free in-store pickup (if available near you). Otherwise, shipping is free on orders of $25 or more.
AND – if you’re a Target REDcard holder , you’ll get FREE shipping on ANY size order and an additional 5% off your purchases! 
(Thanks, Totally Target !)
